meanings.sent1: Ornithologists observe and learn about different bird species.
meanings.sent2: Many ornithologists spend hours in the field watching and documenting birds.
meanings.sent3: The ornithologists were so focused on the birds that they didn't notice the squirrel stealing their snacks.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of colors, ornithologists are the artists who paint with feathers.
meanings.sent5: The ornithologists' passion for birds was as bright as the plumage of a peacock.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the scientific study of birds.
meanings.sent1: Ornithologists use advanced tools to track bird migrations and behaviors.
meanings.sent2: The ornithologists presented their research findings at the international bird conference.
meanings.sent3: When the ornithologists heard the birds singing in harmony, they couldn't help but join in.
meanings.sent4: The ornithologists' knowledge of birds soared higher than the eagles they studied.
meanings.sent5: The ornithologists' dedication to their feathered friends was unwavering.
